thread.title: Anon Y. Moose
thread.title_full: Bundle Stars reviewed by Anon Y. Moose

author: Anon Y. Moose
title: Anon Y. Moose
text:
The prices on Bundle Star are always a steal and keys were always delivered instantly without having to worry about their legitimacy, which is more than you can say about some of Bundle Stars competition.
Aside from various well known titles that I was looking to get I have also discovered one or the other great but extremely unknown game that I would have never come across otherwise. Sure, sometimes there are a few rather mediocre games included in a bundle or games that end up disappointing you a little, I won't sugercoat it. Not once have I regret a purchase though, all the information to every game is available to you right on the website or on the steam pages which are conveniently linked and even if you didn't end up liking a few games, with prices this low it is never ends up being a loss.
